page.title: 02BROADWELL-TRADE
page.content: THERE IS ONLY ONE SHOP IN BROADWELL. THIS IS A SUB-POST OFFICE AND A SMALL GENERAL STORE.IT IS AT THE BACK OF A BUNGALOW IN THE MAIN STREET,IN A CONSERVATORY.A RETIRED LADY RUNS THE SHOP,AND IT IS OPEN ALL DAY MONDAY TO THURSDAY BUT ONLY IN THE MORNING ON FRIDAY AND SATURDAY.THE SHOP HAS BEEN THERE FOR 18 YEARS.SUPPLIES FOR THE SHOP ARE PURCHASED IN RUGBY,SOUTHAM AND DUNCHURCH FROM WHOLESALERS.THE SHOP SELLS DRINKS,SWEETS,ICE CREAMS AND HOUSEHOLD ITEMS LIKE SOAP AND TOILET ROLLS,AS WELL AS A SMALL STOCK OF FOOD.THE VILLAGERS BUY MOST OF THEIR FOOD IN THE NEARBY TOWNS OF RUGBY,SOUTHAM AND LEAMINGTON. ALSO IN THE AREA IS AN AGRICULTURAL SUPPLIERS, "MIDLAND COUNTY SUPPLIES", THIS SELLS FERTILISERS,ANIMAL FEEDS, AND GARDEN TOOLS.THE SUPPLIERS IS SITUATED NEAR TO "NELSON'S QUARRY".
